subject: Baseball
Statistics
lead_paragraph: Even though swinging on a 3-0 count produces significantly higher batting averages, batters are going after fewer 3-0 pitches than at any time in the past 20 years.
snippet: Even though swinging on a 3-0 count produces significantly higher batting averages, batters are going after fewer 3-0 pitches than at any time in the past 20 years.
